Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Gene Huey ` surprised

Eric Schmidt , 55, has no doubt Page is ready for the challenges ahead.`` Larry has been with me in every major decision in the past decade,'' Eric Schmidt said in an interview Thursday. It's not like he has been sitting around doing nothing. Although management by committee worked well enough to turn Google into an enormous success, it eventually slowed Google's reaction to popular new ideas such as Facebook and Twitter.
